name: recommendations(fromUsers:maxCount:restrictingToItems:excluding:excludingObserved:)
desc: Retrieves the highest scored items for the given column of users, based on item similarity and the rating column.
declaration: func recommendations<T>(fromUsers: MLDataColumn<T>, maxCount: Int = 10, restrictingToItems: MLDataColumn<T>? = nil, excluding userItemObservations: MLDataTable? = nil, excludingObserved: Bool = true) throws -> MLDataTable where T : MLDataValueConvertible, T : MLIdentifier
